divs: Sighting DetailsAs usual my husband and I were on our patio viewing the stars. it was about 9:45 pm. All of the sudden as we have seen many times a star-like object was spotted moving south at a high rate of speed at a very high elevation mostlikly in space we assumed. as the object became in the southern area of view we noticed a plane that was flying very high in the western direction and as the object passed in front of and just seemingly higher altitude above the plane, the lights from the plane shined on the object seemed to alumintate it, I believe the object had been close enough to reflect the light from the airplane, I also wonder if the pilot saw it.
Summary: star-like moving southward at a hight rate of speed from center of sky seemingly to near miss a plane which was headed west
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around June 13th 2007
